bibl.title: Pliny's 'Tergedum' discovered.
bibl.note: Polish-Sudanese Southern Dongola Reach Survey, 1997. The Soniyat temple and temenos (district of Tergis) is a part of an agglomeration identical to Pliny's Tergedum mentioned in the itinerary of the Neronian expedition to the sources of the Nile (Hist. Nat. VI, 184-185).
bibl.seg: Polish-Sudanese Southern Dongola Reach Survey, 1997. The Soniyat temple and temenos (district of Tergis) is a part of an agglomeration identical to Pliny's Tergedum mentioned in the itinerary of the Neronian expedition to the sources of the Nile (Hist. Nat. VI, 184-185).
